title: Transforming Research into Media Narratives
eventAddress: Online(Zoom link to be provided upon registration)
detailsText1: Join CDKN Ghana's free webinar to master turning complex research into engaging media stories, with insights from top journalists and communication experts
detailsText2: Whether you are a student, a budding researcher, or an academic, this is your chance to enhance your media presence. Learn narrative techniques, visual storytelling, and publication strategies

title: A Mentoring and lunch session with climate change leaders
